content.prompt: All of the following statements about Aneurin Bevan are true. Which best explains why the doctor chose to address the letter to him?

choices.label: Bevan was a member of the left-leaning Labour Party.
Bevan was the primary architect of the National Health Service.
Bevan was known for his harsh statements regarding the Conservative Party in Britain.
Bevan opposed the wartime coalition government under Winston Churchill.
